start-partup-intro-title: Hi %s, awesome you start a part-up!
start-partup-intro-paragraph: Part-up is a joined effort, but someone has to start. Awesome that you're the one! To find the right uppers for your part-up, you have to give the part-up some direction. Other uppers will join you soon and help you to elaborate. Together you can make it work.
start-partup-intro-explanation: Go through this four steps and start collaborating with your dream team.
start-partup-intro-start-explanation: What are your goals for this part-up?
